descriptionlist.description: Recolors the pull tabs on Muirey03's Zenith to a dark blur!
I had the idea, and @iKilledAppl3 reached out to me about helping me make this. He ended up writing basically all of the code, so shoutout to him!
I plan on adding more features in the future, including custom colors.
This version has initial integration with the stock Dark/Light modes, but it requires a respring to change the tab's colors.

changelog.change: Initial Dark/Light mode switching! (Requires a respring)
